it is still "parts of...". some members of the international community as a matter of fact still doesn't recognize the armenian genocide.

That the Armenians were deported and murdered is not debated by the opposing sides, what is debated is if the Government is involved in the murders.
the "Most Armenian and Western...." claim is a fact. Also, it doesn't refer to the number. The last part is more easy to read like this IMHO... Maybe "murder" is not really neutral.
